class polls.models.Order(id, user, date_ordered, status)¶
Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • date_ordered (DateTimeField) – Date ordered

  • status (CharField) – Status

Parameters:

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

Parameters:
